page.title: 19Arts and Crafts
page.content: In our town we have several potters, painters, sculpters and illustrators. Some of our inhabitants have written books, especially on local history, local ecology or other topics about our area. Most interestingly we have three very intriguing toy makers who work quite seperately on wooden dolls houses, wooden moving toys and large playground toys (like adventure playground equipment). Many housewives try home improvement linked crafts like upholstery classes, needlecrafts and flower arranging. We have an art gallery and a Bradford Arts/Crafts : Co-ordinating Committee. We also have a lady who practises the art of mime and circus clowning including stilt walking.
